title: Sup main
body: Just need a solid adc who can carry. I'm silver

replies.body: yo man im interested and im a ADC main i have 2 silver accounts i play on, ive sent you a friend request accept it and we can get down into the silver elo grind and climb. ( hopfully ) {{champion:236}}

If you want to climb easily don't main support. I mained support out of bronze through to gold and it was a total bitch. To this day I still come across so called adc mains who don't have the slightest clue. You need to learn and play a carry roll.
Why dont you buy sightstone as a support? Not doing so already saying alots about you already.
